greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for deficient numbers (A005100): a(n) = 1 if A001065(n) < n, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
formula: a(n) = 1 - sign(floor(sigma(n)/(2*n))), where sigma is the sum of the divisors of n (A000203). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 01 2020
mathematica: Table[1 - Sign[Floor[DivisorSigma[1, n]/(2 n)]], {n, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 02 2020 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 12 2017
